<tei-TEI data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="TEI" data-origatts="xmlns">

                <tei-author data-origname="author">

                        Bush & Lane
                    </tei-orgName>
                </tei-author>
                <tei-respStmt data-origname="respStmt">
                    <tei-persName xml:id="np" id="np" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="xml:id">
                        <tei-surname data-origname="surname">Pfeffer</tei-surname>
                        <tei-forename data-origname="forename">Niels</tei-forename>
                    </tei-persName>
                </tei-respStmt>
            </tei-titleStmt>
            <tei-publicationStmt data-origname="publicationStmt">
                <tei-publisher data-origname="publisher">
                    <tei-persName data-origname="persName">
                        <tei-persName data-origname="persName">
                            <tei-surname data-origname="surname">Pfeffer</tei-surname>
                            <tei-forename data-origname="forename">Niels</tei-forename>
                        </tei-persName>

                            License
                        </tei-p>
                    </tei-licence>
                </tei-availability>

            <tei-sourceDesc data-origname="sourceDesc">
                <tei-bibl data-origname="bibl">Summertime,–at home!</tei-bibl>
                <tei-biblFull data-origname="biblFull">
                    <tei-titleStmt data-origname="titleStmt">
                        <tei-title level="m" type="main" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">Summertime,–at home!</tei-title>
                        <tei-author data-origname="author">
                            <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Bush & Lane</tei-orgName>
                        </tei-author>
                    </tei-titleStmt>
                    <tei-publicationStmt data-origname="publicationStmt">
                        <tei-publisher data-origname="publisher">
                            <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Masonic News</tei-orgName>
                        </tei-publisher>
                        <!-- Detroit edition -->
                        <tei-pubPlace ref="https://www.geonames.org/4990729" data-origname="pubPlace" data-origatts="ref">Detroit</tei-pubPlace>
                        <tei-date type="publication" data-origname="date" data-origatts="type">1923</tei-date>
                    </tei-publicationStmt>
                    <tei-seriesStmt data-origname="seriesStmt">
                        <tei-title level="j" type="main" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">Masonic News</tei-title>
                        <tei-biblScope unit="issue" data-origname="biblScope" data-origatts="unit">August 1923</tei-biblScope>
                        <tei-biblScope unit="pages" data-origname="biblScope" data-origatts="unit">Backcover</tei-biblScope>
                    </tei-seriesStmt>
                </tei-biblFull>
            </tei-sourceDesc>
        </tei-fileDesc>
        <tei-profileDesc data-origname="profileDesc">

                <tei-language ident="ger" data-origname="language" data-origatts="ident">German</tei-language>

    </tei-teiHeader>
    <tei-facsimile data-origname="facsimile">
        <tei-surface data-origname="surface">
            <tei-graphic url="mdp.39015086654038-seq_44.tif" width="2692" height="3540" data-origname="graphic" data-origatts="height width url" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2170,1628 2170,1736 2044,1777 2044,2114 2020,2145 1855,2186 2005,2210 2036,2242 2028,2302 1849,2326 1824,2365 944,2365 708,2310 716,2257 840,2257 944,2194 700,2169 692,1832 716,1785 574,1760 582,1628 2123,1589" id="eSc_textblock_d7c9744b" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2068,2533 2091,2603 2076,2743 2202,2824 2186,2987 1792,3034 661,3018 598,2995 590,2761 669,2688 692,2462 1651,2430" id="eSc_textblock_05f06f3c" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1367,3248 1367,3254 1314,3254 1320,3248" id="eSc_textblock_cfbc1ad0" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1407,3241 1407,3246 1385,3246 1389,3241" id="eSc_textblock_dcad29ca" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="464,505 495,1556 2216,1522 2199,466" id="eSc_textblock_7ddb1b75" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_d7c9744b" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_7ddb1b75" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
                <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                    <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                        A party, several couples dancing. Behind the window one can
                        see a grand piano.
                    </tei-desc>
                </tei-figure>
            </tei-div>
            <tei-head data-origname="head">
                <tei-hi rendition="#i #c" class="i c" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Summertime,-at home!
                </tei-hi>
            </tei-head>

            <tei-p data-origname="p">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                <tei-seg ana="#home #entertainment #hostess" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    <tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">Entertaining</tei-hi> at home in the summertime is a very easy and a very enjoyable mat-
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ter for the hostess who has a
                    <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">
                        Bush & Lane Welte-Mignon (Licensce) Reproducing Piano.
                    </tei-name>
                </tei-seg>
            </tei-p>

            <tei-p data-origname="p">
                <tei-seg ana="#entertainment" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">During</tei-hi> dinner, guests are entertained by the most beautiful music of all time played
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>by practically all of the great pianists of the past two decades.
                </tei-seg>
            </tei-p>

            <tei-p data-origname="p">
                <tei-seg ana="#dance #popular #jazz" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">After</tei-hi> dinner comes dancing, perhaps on the veranda, with the
                    <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> provid-
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ing the newest and most popular dance hits, played by a hundred masters of jazz.
                </tei-seg>
            </tei-p>

            <tei-p data-origname="p">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">Really</tei-hi>, with a
                <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> at home, one has no desire and certainly no need to
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>search elsewhere for a satisfactory place in which to entertain one's guests.
            </tei-p>

            <tei-p data-origname="p">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                <tei-hi rend="#i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">
                    Conventional Models Consistently Priced at
                    <tei-measure commodity="wm" unit="dollar" quantity="1075" data-origname="measure" data-origatts="quantity unit commodity">
                        $1075
                    </tei-measure>
                    to
                    <tei-measure commodity="wm" unit="dollar" quantity="4100" data-origname="measure" data-origatts="quantity unit commodity">
                        $4100
                    </tei-measure>
                </tei-hi>
            </tei-p>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">
                Bush & Lane Piano Co.
            </tei-orgName>,
            <tei-address data-origname="address">
                Detroit Sales Rooms, 1514 Woodward Ave.
            </tei-address>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            World's Largest Makers of High Grade Pianos Exclusively
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_05f06f3c" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Bush & Lane
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte-Mignon
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>(Licensee)
        </tei-div>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
